website_summaries.verdict: With a thoughtful design and features that give you outstanding control, this saddle is a good choice for avid cyclists.
pros: Ergonomic structure that's narrow and long gives you outstanding control on all types of road conditions
We love the proprietary Wing Flex technology that allow the edges to flex as you ride
cons: Requires a short break-in period for some riders for maximum comfort

customer_reviews.title: Good for butts, not for nuts.
customer_reviews.text: The dealer was great and got me the saddle quickly. In general, this saddle is well-padded and decently light for what it is. It's far more comfortable on my rear end than my Specialized Romin Evo Pro or my Selle Italia SLR. However, I've spent the past month and a half not being able to feel my junk. Except for when it feels like I'm peeing razor blades. If you have a problem with numb-nuts on other saddles, this one is only going to make it worse. I ultimately got the Arione VS-X which needs to be broken in, but after 2 100 mile rides, the VS-X is just way more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TacomaCyclist

customer_reviews.title: All About the Fit
customer_reviews.text: I've use the Fizik Arione Road saddle for more than 10 years, because it fits me perfectly. I have one installed on at least 6 different bikes (don't ask!). This particular one replaces another that finally wore out after 7 years of very frequent use. While comfort should be your number one concern, I also love the Arione because it offers a wide variety of fore and aft positions while riding, and it's very light and durable.
customer_reviews.author: RTK

customer_reviews.title: initial impressions are good. fit and finish are very nice
customer_reviews.text: initial impressions are good. fit and finish are very nice. so far have only ridden in circles around my basement but feels good so far.
customer_reviews.author: MartyLoo

customer_reviews.title: Not for me... major chafing & pain
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to try this saddle as I had never tried a Fizik before. Immediately, I was disappointed. Despite trying numerous angles and fore/aft positions, this saddle refused to be comfortable for me. There is no cutout, which resulted in severe pain and chafing in the perenium (taint) area. For those also experiencing perenium issues, definitely look for a saddle with a large cutout. This completed alleviated my issues after the first ride.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Seats are a very personal choice, but this one was immediately comfortable as soon as I sat on it. So far I've done up to 30mi rides on it with no discomfort, but planning on putting in 75mi rides this summer.
customer_reviews.author: rally25rs

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a short ride.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and materials, just comfortable enough to keep you riding for 2 or 3 good hours, I wish they have bigger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Christian G.

customer_reviews.title: light and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase of this saddle... not as light as the carbon model but its 240grams so its not really heavy at all super comfortable, i had my doubts but after doing my first century on this saddle i have no sores or pains in that area highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: JUAN

customer_reviews.title: Best price available!
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find for this seat. Fizik seats are awesome. Beat all other prices by $15-$20
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ricci

customer_reviews.title: excellent road bike saddle
customer_reviews.text: My husband does several 20+ mile bike rides and has had zero complaints. He said it is very comfortable. It has the necessary soft cushioning down the middle for male comfort, looks sharp, and is very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Derr

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome saddle. 20 mile ride right out of the box and noticed a huge difference. The thinner design allows you to pedal harder by allowing your hips more freedom to move. Super comfortable. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat
customer_reviews.text: Great seat holds up very nice I weighed 230 and it felt very comfortable and looked really nice
customer_reviews.author: Masi

customer_reviews.title: Love the saddle.  UPS delivered to the wrong address.
customer_reviews.text: I love this saddle. It is very comfortable. I bought a new Arione to replace my last one that got many miles use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle, even for the longest rides.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone's anatomies are different which is what makes finding the right saddle a difficult journey. Well for me, that journey ended the day I purchased the Fizik Arione.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable seat after a break in period of a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably a little expensive for what it is. You're ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably a little expensive for what it is. You're paying for the name, but the classic shape is hard to go wrong with,
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Butt-friendly saddle
customer_reviews.text: I tested it at Heartbreak Double Century last May 17, 2014 and it didn't disappoint at all. Best saddle for the money.
customer_reviews.author: NOEL V. NABOR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good saddle I have used this same style for a long time with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J S

customer_reviews.title: great saddle.
customer_reviews.text: ymmv but fits my booty perfectly. flexes some to absorb road noise. great saddle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... are a very personal choice but this is my favorite. 3 bikes 3 Arione
customer_reviews.text: Saddles are a very personal choice but this is my favorite. 3 bikes 3 Arione saddles
customer_reviews.author: Philc

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel completely. Great light saddle for the price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. Just enough cushion, and I think I can feel the wing flex working. The points hit just right on my sit bones. I haven't gone on over 40 mile rides on it, but I've been comfortable on all my rides. If this seat doesn't feel just right for you, check the bike setup. It's more likely that than the seat's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hoyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome saddle. Was riding a wider saddle per normal ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome saddle. Was riding a wider saddle per normal standards but found out I needed to use a skinnier one.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Elliott

customer_reviews.title: I have done a couple metric centuries on it and was very comfortable. Thinking on getting another one for my Evo
customer_reviews.text: Light and very narrow. I was surprised on the comfort. I put it on an older Cannondale r1000 I have at my second house. Only ride it when I am in town there. I have done a couple metric centuries on it and was very comfortable. Thinking on getting another one for my Evo.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Fizik Arione
customer_reviews.text: I like the saddle. I have yet to find the perfect one but this one fits me well. It replaced my Selle Italia Flite
customer_reviews.author: M. Fineberg

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Product came earlier than expected, real neat delivery. It is very comfortable and really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: shinta dewi komalasair

customer_reviews.title: High performance seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat. I have had one on my road bike for years. It supports me well and has held up perfectly over the last five years over many thousands of miles. Now that I am riding indoors more due to the pandemic, I decided to replace the seat on my indoor training bike so that my indoor setup would match my outdoor road bike. I am suddenly much more comfortable indoors and I now do not need to get used to each setup as I go back and forth from indoors to outdoors and back again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: good, but not comfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: Biggest thing was a bit of numbness that I experienced after 20 minutes of riding. Not altogether uncomfortable, for very short rides around the block, but not great for anything longer for me. Most likely due to the continuous curve of the saddle as opposed to the central cutout of many men's saddles. Good quality construction and materials, lightweight, looks good.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle, but know what you are getting into
customer_reviews.text: This an amazing saddle for the money, but be aware that it is a very acquired shape. It is VERY aggressive, and has absolutely no cutout or shape to enhance blood flow to the soft tissue. That doesn't mean it will be automatically uncomfortable (it might be perfect for your butt shape who knows), BUT it is very likely to exacerbate or cause perineum/soft tissue problems if that is something you are prone in a saddle. While I loved this saddle, I just couldn't get a position that worked for me for more than 30-40 minutes. Good saddle, but not for everyone (including me).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Saddles are personal preference so tough to review. Can vouch for how light it feels.
customer_reviews.author: AWDV8

customer_reviews.title: amazing saddle i have it on my race bike and ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing saddle i have it on my race bike and it works great no numb bits even after 100+ mile rides at higher speeds
customer_reviews.author: Panda

product_meta.title: Fizik Arione K:ium Rails Road Bicycle Saddle
product_meta.description: The classic original Arione saddle handmade in Italy. Featuring wing flex, K:ium rails and a thermoplastic shell. Fi'zi:k all time best selling saddle designed for snakes or those with very flexible low backs.
feature_bullets: Made for Snake- Designed for the flexible riding style of the Snake.
K:ium Rail- Combines a particular metal alloy, a specific tubular design and a special finishing process which increases fatigue performance
Wingflex Technology- Engineered flexibility along the edges where the inner thighs contact the saddle for full range of leg motion.
Carbon Reinforced Nylon- The Shell is made of high strength and flexible carbon reinforced nylon.
Equipped with a Microtex Cover and an Integrated Clip System capability
